definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dissolve, melt, intr. (Targum [[מְסַס]]; cf. [[מסה]], and II. [[מאס]]);—

definitions.title: Qal.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[מְסׂס נׁסֵס]] Is 10:18; like the melting (wasting away) of a [[נׁסֵס]] (q.v.)
melt (intr.) of manna Ex 16:21; wax Ps 68:3 (sim. of wicked); manacles Ju Jdg 15:14 (= vanished, dropped off); wicked Ps 112:10 (melt away); especially of hills and mts. Mic 1:4, Ps 97:5, Is 34:3.
most oft. fig. of heart = faint, grow fearful, Na 2:11, 2Sa 17:10, 2Sa 17:10 (cf. Dr), De 20:8, Jos 2:11, Jos 5:1, Jos 7:5, Is 13:7, Is 19:1, Ez Eze 21:12, Ps 22:15.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הֵמַסּוּ אֶת־לְבָבֵנוּ]] De 1:28 cause to melt ( = intimidate).
